entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Laval
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:35 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy and ending near midnight then clearing. Blowing snow this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
